extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: MTHE 351 or STAT 351 and MTHE 332 and registered in BSCE.

basic.description: Optimal control of stochastic systems with applications to engineering systems and applied mathematics. Topics include Markov chains and stochastic stability, Martingales, dynamic programming, fully observed and partially observed models, nonlinear filtering, Kalman Filtering, linear programming approach, team decision and information structures.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Control Of Stochastic Systems
